C interface for the atmosphere emulator (Fortran-callable).

detaileddescription.para: Provides extern "C" functions that can be called from Fortran via ISO_C_BINDING. These functions wrap the EmulatorAtm C++ class methods.

The interface follows the E3SM component lifecycle:
create_instance - Initialize MPI and component
set_grid_data - Set grid decomposition
init_coupling_indices - Parse MCT field lists
setup_coupling - Set coupling buffer pointers
init - Load model and prepare for time stepping
run - Execute time steps
finalize - Clean up resources

simplesect.para: emulator_atm_f2c.F90 for the Fortran interface module
